mapper.select: SELECT nm.id , nm.sender_id , concat(d.name,' ',c.name,' ',e.name) AS "sender_name" , nm.content , nm.date , a.id AS "file" FROM note_message nm INNER JOIN note_receiver nr ON nr.note_id = nm.id INNER JOIN employee e ON e.id = nm.sender_id INNER JOIN department d ON d.id = e.department_id INNER JOIN code c ON c.id = e.pos_id AND c.type_id = '300' LEFT JOIN attach a ON a.tbl_id='104' AND a.parent_id=nm.id WHERE receiver_id=#{employee.id} AND box_type=#{type} ORDER BY nm.date desc LIMIT ${pager.startIndex}, ${pager.perPage}

SELECT nm.id , nm.sender_id , concat(d.name,' ',c.name,' ',e.name) AS "sender_name" , nm.content , nm.date , a.id AS "file" , a.origin_name AS "filename" FROM note_message nm INNER JOIN employee e ON e.id = nm.sender_id INNER JOIN department d ON d.id = e.department_id INNER JOIN code c ON c.id = e.pos_id AND c.type_id = '300' LEFT JOIN attach a ON a.tbl_id='104' AND a.parent_id=nm.id WHERE nm.id = #{id}
